data.title: Tom Hanks: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Tom Hanks: Check out the list of all Tom Hanks movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Tom Hanks news on Times of India.
data.text:
Do you know that Junaid Khan auditioned for Aamir Khan’s role in Laal Singh Chaddha? Exclusive!

etimes.in / Jul 02, 2024, 16:09 (IST)

Junaid Khan, Aamir Khan's son, auditioned for the lead role in Laal Singh Chaddha, but wasn't selected. His impressive audition caught Aditya Chopra's attention, leading to his debut in Maharaj which is directed by Siddharth P Malhotra. Junaid underwent a significant transformation, losing 26 kgs, over two years for his film debut.

Austin Butler reveals how he got starstruck by Ryan Gosling

etimes.in / Jun 21, 2024, 17:09 (IST)

Austin Butler is no stranger to Hollywood. This Oscar-nominated actor made an appearance on the Today show on Thursday. He revealed that a run-in with the Barbie star Ryan Gosling made him so nervous that he couldn’t even introduce himself. Gosling wasn’t the only Hollywood notable that Butler has been captivated by. He also recalled attending a star-studded party recently, hosted by Paul McCartney, as revealed on Jimmy Kimmel Live

Aamir Khan my favourite, watched 'Laal Singh Chaddha' 4 times: Turkish envoy Firat Sunel

PTI / Mar 31, 2024, 18:32 (IST)

Ambassador of Turkiye to India Firat Sunel is a fan of Bollywood movies, especially the Aamir Khan-starrer "Laal Singh Chaddha", a film the diplomat says he has watched at least four times. "Laal Singh Chaddha", which was an authorised remake of the Hollywood classic "Forrest Gump", was "more successful" than the 1994 original movie starring Tom Hanks, according to Sunel.

How Taylor Swift fell ‘victim’ to deep fake

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Jan 10, 2024, 19:33 (IST)

Singer-songwriter Taylor Swift is the latest celebrity to fall prey to deep fake, and her fans, who are often referred to as “Swifties,” are duped out of hundreds of dollars. Ads on Facebook featuring Taylor Swift endorsing Le Creuset have surfaced in recent weeks, which are not real. So, Taylor Swift is not giving out free Le Creuset products in social media advertisements — however, deep fakes of her voice would like you to believe otherwise.

Tom Hanks has a warning about AI creating a 'fake' Tom Hanks

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Oct 03, 2023, 14:01 (IST)

Tom Hanks has warned Instagram users about a deepfake video of himself being used to promote dental plans. The actor clarified that he had no involvement in the advertisement and cautioned viewers to be wary of the AI-generated version of him. Hanks has previously expressed concerns about the potential misuse of AI, as it becomes increasingly difficult to differentiate between real and manipulated content. This incident highlights the ongoing issue of deepfakes and raises questions about their impact on the entertainment industry.

Tom Hanks served Cher when he worked as bellhop at a hotel

IANS / Dec 04, 2023, 18:28 (IST)

Tom Hanks recalls working for Cher during his time as a bellman at the Oakland Hilton Hotel in the 1970s. He shares a brief interaction with Cher when he delivered a bag to her room. Tom praises Cher's performance in 'Mamma Mia! 2' and suggests a group outing to watch her movies. He appears on 'The Graham Norton Show' alongside Cher, Julia Roberts, and Timothee Chalamet.

Tom Hanks warns fans about his 'AI version' promoting dental plan: Have nothing to do with it

PTI / Oct 02, 2023, 13:36 (IST)

Tom Hanks has warned his fans about a dental plan advertisement featuring an AI version of him. He took to Instagram to clarify that he has nothing to do with the promotional campaign video. Hanks has previously expressed concerns about the use of artificial intelligence and deepfake technology in the creative industries, highlighting the legal and artistic challenges they present.

Deepfakes are real...How can you safeguard yourself from rising identity theft?

TNN / Nov 09, 2023, 14:42 (IST)

The rise of deepfake technology, demonstrated through videos and images of celebrities like Rashmika Mandanna and Katrina Kaif, has sparked a conversation about the need for legal protection against its misuse. Deepfakes are generated using artificial intelligence to manipulate images or videos, often placing a person's face on another's body. Identifying deepfakes can be challenging, but analyzing body and facial movements, checking for discrepancies in the background, and listening for audio inconsistencies can help. The government has urged social media companies to remove morphed content promptly. Several celebrities, including Scarlett Johansson and Tom Hanks, have been victims of deepfakes.

Scarlett Johansson takes legal action AI app for using her name and likeness in advertisement

PTI / Nov 02, 2023, 17:53 (IST)

Scarlett Johansson has filed a lawsuit against an AI app for using her name and likeness without permission in an advertisement. The app, X by Lisa AI: 90's Yearbook & Avatar, posted a 22-second ad featuring behind-the-scenes footage of Johansson from her upcoming Marvel film "Black Widow." The ad has since been taken down. Johansson's lawyer stated that appropriate legal actions were taken and they will pursue all available remedies. This comes just a month after Tom Hanks also warned his fans about an AI dental plan advertisement using his likeness.

Scarlett Johansson is suing this AI app developer for cloning her voice

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Nov 02, 2023, 12:36 (IST)

Hollywood actress Scarlett Johansson has taken legal action against an AI app that used her name and likeness in an online advertisement without permission. The ad, posted on X by an app called Lisa AI: 90’s Yearbook & Avatar, used real footage of Johansson to generate a fake image and dialogue. Johansson's attorney confirmed that appropriate legal actions were taken. This comes after Tom Hanks warned his fans about a promotional video featuring an AI version of him.

Aamir Khan to have a cameo in Sunny Deol starrer Lahore, 1947 - Exclusive!

etimes.in / Oct 09, 2023, 11:50 (IST)

Aamir Khan is all set to produce Sunny Deol starrer Lahore, 1947. While rest of the cast is yet undecided, ETimes has learnt that Aamir will essay a cameo alongside Sunny in this project.

From Titanic to Indiana Jones: Hollywood's treasured memorabilia up for grabs

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Oct 03, 2023, 19:04 (IST)

A collection of film and television memorabilia worth $14.6 million will be auctioned next month. The collection includes over 1,800 items, with the highlight being the illuminated headpiece worn by Anthony Daniels as C-3PO in "Star Wars: A New Hope," valued at $600,000 to $1.2 million. Other items include Leonardo DiCaprio's attire from "Titanic," Ursula Andress's bathrobe from "Dr. No," and Johnny Depp's stunt costume from "Pirates of the Caribbean."

Tom Hanks issues warning over unauthorized AI version in dental plan advertisement

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Oct 02, 2023, 18:28 (IST)

Tom Hanks has warned his fans about an advertisement featuring an unauthorized AI version of himself. The Hollywood legend expressed his concern on Instagram, sharing a screenshot from the promotional video. Hanks has previously discussed the challenges posed by AI and deepfake technology in the creative industries, including the difficulty of distinguishing between AI-generated performances and real ones. His warning tells ethical considerations & legal complexities around AI & deepfake usage.
